title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
instructions: Boil water and cook spaghetti according to package directions
Crisp the pancetta in a large pan
Whisk eggs with grated cheese and black pepper
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra cheese

title: Penne Arrabbiata
description: Spicy pasta dish from Rome with tomatoes and chilies
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan with garlic and chilies
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes
Cook penne according to package directions
Drain pasta and toss with sauce
Garnish with parsley and cheese
Serve hot

title: Lasagna Bolognese
description: Traditional layered pasta with meat sauce and béchamel
instructions: Prepare Bolognese sauce by browning meat and vegetables
Add tomatoes and wine, simmer for 2 hours
Make béchamel sauce with butter, flour, and milk
Cook lasagna sheets until al dente
Layer pasta, Bolognese, and béchamel in baking dish
Top with Parmesan and bake at 180°C for 45 minutes
Rest for 10 minutes before serving

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish with butter and Parmesan cheese
instructions: Cook fettuccine in salted water until al dente
Melt butter in large pan with minced garlic
Add heavy cream and bring to gentle simmer
Drain pasta and add to cream sauce
Toss with Parmesan cheese until creamy
Season with salt, pepper, and parsley
Serve immediately

title: Pesto Genovese with Linguine
description: Traditional basil pesto from Liguria with pine nuts
instructions: Toast pine nuts until golden
Blend basil, garlic, pine nuts, and salt in food processor
Slowly add olive oil while blending
Stir in grated cheeses
Cook linguine until al dente
Reserve pasta water and drain linguine
Toss pasta with pesto, adding pasta water if needed

title: Spaghetti alle Vongole
description: Neapolitan pasta with clams in white wine sauce
instructions: Soak clams in salted water to remove sand
Heat olive oil with garlic and pepper flakes
Add clams and white wine, cover until they open
Cook spaghetti until al dente
Reserve pasta water and drain
Toss pasta with clam sauce
Garnish with parsley and serve

title: Rigatoni all'Amatriciana
description: Spicy pasta from Amatrice with tomatoes and guanciale
instructions: Cut guanciale into strips and cook until crispy
Add chili and deglaze with white wine
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer 15 minutes
Cook rigatoni until al dente
Drain and toss with sauce
Add Pecorino Romano and black pepper
Serve hot

title: Orecchiette with Broccoli Rabe
description: Pugliese pasta with bitter greens and sausage
instructions: Blanch broccoli rabe in salted water
Cook sausage and remove from pan
Sauté garlic and pepper flakes in oil
Add broccoli rabe and sausage
Cook orecchiette until al dente
Combine pasta with vegetables and sausage
Finish with Pecorino Romano

title: Cacio e Pepe
description: Simple Roman pasta with cheese and black pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente
Reserve 250ml pasta water before draining
Toast black pepper in large pan
Add small amount of pasta water to pan
Add drained pasta and toss vigorously
Add grated Pecorino and more pasta water
Toss until creamy and serve immediately

title: Pasta Puttanesca
description: Bold Neapolitan pasta with olives, capers, and anchovies
instructions: Heat oil with garlic, anchovies, and pepper flakes
Add tomatoes, olives, and capers
Simmer sauce for 15 minutes
Cook spaghetti until al dente
Drain and toss with sauce
Garnish with parsley
Serve immediately

title: Tortellini in Brodo
description: Stuffed pasta in rich chicken broth from Emilia-Romagna
instructions: Bring chicken broth to a gentle boil
Add fresh tortellini to broth
Cook for 3-4 minutes until they float
Ladle into bowls with broth
Garnish with Parmesan and parsley
Serve hot with black pepper

title: Pasta alla Norma
description: Sicilian pasta with eggplant, tomatoes, and ricotta salata
instructions: Slice eggplant, salt, and let drain 30 minutes
Fry eggplant slices until golden
Make tomato sauce with garlic and basil
Cook rigatoni until al dente
Combine pasta with tomato sauce
Add fried eggplant and ricotta salata
Serve with fresh basil

title: Ravioli with Sage Butter
description: Stuffed pasta with brown butter and crispy sage
instructions: Cook ravioli in salted water until they float
Melt butter in large pan until golden brown
Add sage leaves and fry until crispy
Drain ravioli and add to brown butter
Toss gently to coat
Serve with Parmesan and pepper

title: Bucatini all'Amatriciana
description: Traditional Roman pasta with tomatoes and guanciale
instructions: Dice guanciale and cook until crispy
Add chili and deglaze with wine
Add tomatoes and simmer 20 minutes
Cook bucatini until al dente
Combine pasta with sauce
Add Pecorino and black pepper
Serve immediately

title: Farfalle with Salmon and Cream
description: Elegant pasta dish with smoked salmon and dill
instructions: Sauté diced onion until translucent
Add white wine and reduce
Add cream and bring to simmer
Cook farfalle until al dente
Add salmon pieces to cream sauce
Drain pasta and combine with sauce
Finish with dill and lemon juice
